welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Changzhi, a charming city known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning natural scenery. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

restaurants.name: Eske Place Coffee House
restaurants.description: Eske Place Coffee House is a café located in the city.

restaurants.name: 崙仔頂小吃店
restaurants.description: 崙仔頂小吃店 is a afghan restaurant located in 屏東縣.
restaurants.address: 長治鄉中興路549號, 屏東縣, 屏東縣 908

restaurants.name: 新園正宗廣東汕頭牛肉爐
restaurants.description: 新園正宗廣東汕頭牛肉爐 is a hotpot restaurant located in P’ing-tung.
restaurants.address: 興市巷13號, P’ing-tung, 屏東縣 900

restaurants.name: 美菊麵店
restaurants.description: 美菊麵店 is a noodle restaurant located in 屏東市.

restaurants.name: 北方園
restaurants.description: 北方園 is a asian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kaoshiung International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Kaoshiung International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network throughout the airport by selecting the 'KIA Free WiFi' network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.
